content: Hi I will give you an ID Card you should use it when you need holding+email not I will give youLike this email ask all bet account to withdraw the money(((Hello! You should make a selfie, holding your document near your face. Also next to you should be the computer (or mobile device) where we can see your inbox messages from security department (this message).Your face, your document in the hand and the dialogue with the Security department opened on any device should be fully and clearly seen on the same photo. All data should be clearly visible)))Nid price: 20 USDPer bookie holdiong+email note: 30 USDcontact me nowhttps://t.me/ewalletbomber

You should make a selfie, holding your document near your face. Also next to you should be the computer (or mobile device) where we can see your inbox messages from security department (this message).Your face, your document in the hand and the dialogue with the Security department opened on any device should be fully and clearly seen on the same photo. All data should be clearly visible)))Nid price: 20 USDPer bookie holdiong+email note: 30 USDcontact me nowhttps://t.me/ewalletbomberHow you will provide the solution when the name of the account is mismatched with the account holder? Will you create an Id card the same as the account or something else? In this case, I am still confused about how you will solve the face verification while you have to hold notes in your hand.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: eWallet-Partner on July 21, 2023, 10:43:28 AMupI have just come to know you have created a post after me but you have not replied to my questions. Avoiding questions is not a good sign of a service/business. You should make clear to the community about the service/business. Avoiding such a thing should be considered nothing but scaam attempt.
